dt: {bc}a barrel-shaped vessel of staves, headings, and hoops usually for liquids

et: Middle English {it}caske{/it}, perhaps from Middle French {it}casque{/it} helmet, from Spanish {it}casco{/it} potsherd, skull, helmet
shortdef: a barrel-shaped vessel of staves, headings, and hoops usually for liquids
a cask and its contents; also : the quantity contained in a cask
